definition: falsetto/opposite: natural or true voice 真聲|真声[zhen1 sheng1]
fake/false/artificial/to borrow/if/suppose
see 假掰[gei1 bai1]
vacation
sound/voice/tone/noise/reputation/classifier for sounds

sentences.english: Singing on a broad range of men and women with cohomology cavity, cavity with male falsetto.
sentences.chinese: 唱法上音域寬廣，男女同腔同調，男腔用假聲。

sentences.english: He sang to himself in a soft falsetto.
sentences.chinese: 他用柔和的假聲自吟自唱。

sentences.english: Here you can hear Lee Hom showcasing his vocal talents again of course, with a few falsettos thrown in.
sentences.chinese: 你又能聽見力宏聲音的天賦，當然，還合着一些假聲。

hard to tell if it's real or sham
